§ 41908. Effect on foreign postal arrangements This part does not—(1) affect an arrangement made by the United States Government with the postal administration of a foreign country related to the transportation of mail by aircraft; or
(2) impair the authority of the United States Postal Service to make such an arrangement.
(Pub. L. 103–272, § 1(e), July 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 1157, § 41912; renumbered § 41908, Pub. L. 110–405, § 2(b)(7)(B), Oct. 13, 2008, 122 Stat. 4289.)
